SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.interfaces

Interface IController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface IController extends Remote
Defines the methods a Controller can execute. Extends the Remote interface. A Controller manages and contains all the logic above the singular matches, for the matches logic is created a GameController, one for each game.
See Also:
  • IGameController
  • GameController

    Method

    VirtualClient

  • Method Details

    • sendCommand

      void sendCommand(ServerQueueObject obj) throws RemoteException
      Send a ServerQueueObject from the client to the Controller or the GameController on Server.
      Parameters:
      obj - Object command specific for each command
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a generic connection problem with the server occurs

    • getRightConnection

      VirtualClient getRightConnection(int token) throws RemoteException
      This method return the specific VirtualClient associated with the unique token received as a parameter. The newConnections map contains every VirtualClient connected with the Server and the unique token associated with it.
      Parameters:
      token - is the token associated to the VirtualClient t
      Returns:
      the VirtualClient that has the given token
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • updateHeartBeat

      void updateHeartBeat(VirtualClient client) throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked for every HeartBeatObj received. The method updates the time value kept in the private attribute clientsHeartBeat for the VirtualClient that sent it. Furthermore, if an HeartBeatObj arrives but the client is not in the Map a specific message is written.
      Parameters:
      client - is the client that sent the heart beat
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs in the rmi connection
